title: Surging Share Prices in Japan Lead to a Wave of Stock Splits
description: Japan’s stock market has notched up record after record this year, but individual investors are having a harder time joining the party.
content: Japan’s stock market has notched up record after record this year, but individual investors are having a harder time joining the party.
